elements.text: In the past, you tested yourself to see if you could navigate around town without technology. You've had to start using your GPS more over time, and you're concerned. You decide to make it a game to switch back and forth from your intuition to your GPS, and this is...

elements.name: Navigating Around Town_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
